about_the_game:
This game is a 3D fighting game for adults that includes sexual acts.
Please be aware that it contains very sexual content.

This is the trial version of RUMBLE BLAZING.

There are many restrictions compared to the main game, such as the number of characters, techniques, costumes, and stages that can be used, as well as restrictions on sexual content.
Also, since the main game is still in development, only a few functions are available in the trial version.
Please use it only to check the atmosphere and computer specs.

Also, the main game is currently in early access, so there may be differences from the trial version.
Save data from the trial version cannot be used in the main game.

Main story explanation
Aim for victory while exchanging skills in various costumes and stages!

You can grab your opponent and perform tricks on them, or destroy their costumes.
At the shop, you can purchase costumes, stages, and items that can be used during battles.

If you purchase a pass from the shop, you will be able to use sexual techniques during a match, or you can perform an erotic punishment game on your losing opponent.
Other items available in the shop include items that allow you to fill up the H gauge from the beginning, and items that allow you to start a battle with the item in your possession.

Sexual techniques during battle can be derived from the middle of a grabbing technique once the H gauge has accumulated, or you can suddenly use a sexual technique.

Simple customization is also possible, such as changing hair color and skin color.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a lot of sexually explicit material.
It contains BDSM elements, bondage (strap-ons, etc.), catfights, violence (martial arts), revealing costumes, nudity, costume destruction, sexual violence, non-consensual sex, and sexual acts while performing martial arts.
It contains mature content and may not be suitable for viewing at work.
All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080
